ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:0.5_0: 45. The training rule on sitting down in private
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.2_0: Venerable Upananda the Sakyan went to the house of a friend and sat down in private alone with his wife.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.3_0: That man complained and criticized him,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.4_0: “How can Venerable Upananda sit down in private alone with my wife?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.5_0: The monks heard the complaints of that man,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.6_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.7_0: “How can Venerable Upananda sit down in private alone with a woman?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.8_0: “Is it true, Upananda, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.11_0: “... Foolish man, how can you sit down in private alone with a woman?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:1.14.1_0: ‘If a monk sits down in private alone with a woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.6_0: a human female, not a female spirit, not a female ghost, not a female animal; one who understands and is capable of discerning bad speech and good speech, what is indecent and what is decent.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.8_0: The Buddha then sat down together.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.10_0: she is both a female and a female.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.12_0: one sees the eye in private.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.14_0: he is not able to make a heap or a shaking, or a wking on his head.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.16_0: it is not possible to learn.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.18_0: If a monk sits down or lies down next to a seated woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.19_0: If a female sits down or lies down next to the seated monk, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.1.20_0: If both have him seated together, they commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.2.1_0: If it is a woman, and he perceives her as such, and he sits down in private alone with her, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.2.2_0: If it is a woman, but he is unsure of it, and he sits down in private alone with her, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.2.3_0: If it is a woman, but he does not perceive her as such, and he sits down in private alone with her, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.2.4_0: If he sits down in private alone with a female spirit, with a female ghost, with a _paṇḍaka_, or with a female animal in the form of a woman, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.2.5_0: If it is not a woman, but he perceives her as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.2.6_0: If it is not a home, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.2.7_0: If it is not a woman, and he does not perceive her as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.3.2_0: if he has a companion who understands;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.3.3_0: if he sits when the seat is not standing;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.3.4_0: if he is not seeking privacy;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.3.5_0: if he sits down on the seat;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc45:2.3.8_0: The fifth rule, the training rule on sitting in private, is finished.
